column2: This is the current expected successor of the religion head.

The Atenic religion is a proto-monotheistic religion that split off from Kemetism. Originally founded by the pharaoh Akhenaten, this heresy usurped the position of supreme god, typically held by Amun, with Aten. In addition, this heresy completely disowns the other Kemetic gods in complete favour of Aten. The heresy died out shortly after Akhenaten's death.
column3: Le culte d'Aton est une religion proto-monothéiste qui dérive du Kémitisme. Fondée par le pharaon Akhénaton, cette hérésie plaça Aton en position de dieu supresme, au lieu de l'habituel Amon. De plus, cette hérésie balaie complètement les aultres dieux kémites en faveur d'Aton. L'hérésie disparut peu de temps après le trépas d'Akhénaton.
column4: The Atenic religion is a proto-monotheistic religion that split off from Kemetism. Founded by the pharaoh Akhenaten, this heresy usurped the position of supreme god, typically held by Amun, with Aten. In addition, this heresy completely disowns the other Kemetic gods in complete favour of Aten. The heresy died out shortly after Akhenaten's death.
column6: The Atenic religion is a proto-monotheistic religion that split off from Kemetism. Founded by the pharaoh Akhenaten, this heresy usurped the position of supreme god, typically held by Amun, with Aten. In addition, this heresy completely disowns the other Kemetic gods in complete favour of Aten. The heresy died out shortly after Akhenaten's death.

column2: Bektashism is a Sufi mystic order whose central tenet is the Wahdat-ul-Wujood - the single unified entity Allah-Muhammed-Ali.
column3:
Le Bektashisme est un ordre mystique soufi dont le principe central est le Wahdat-ul-Wujood - l'affirmation qu'il n'y a que Dieu qui est, en plus de leur vénération de l'Imam Ali. C'est considéré comme une hérésie dans le jeu. Dans le jeu :
§Y*§! Les dirigeants musulmans peuvent (et sont censés) avoir plusieurs femmes
§Y*§! Les mosquées peuvent estre détenues par quiconque sans pénalité
§Y*§! Les dynasties musulmanes deviennent décadentes, sauf si les hommes ont assez de terres et qu'ils gagnent des guerres
column4:
Bestimmende Merkmale im Spiel:
§Y*§! Muslimische Herrscher können und sollten mehrere Ehefrauen haben
§Y*§! Moschee-Liegenschaften können von Jedem ohne Strafe gehalten werden
§Y*§! Muslimische Dynastien werden mit der Zeit dekadent, außer die Männer besitzen ausreichend Land und gewinnen Kriege
column6:
Definiendo características del juego:
§Y*§! Los gobernantes Musulmanes pueden tener (y se espera que tengan) varias esposas
§Y*§! Las Celebraciones en la Mezquita pueden ser celebradas por cualquier persona sin cargos
§Y*§! Las dinastías Musulmanas se vuelven decadentes a menos que los hombres tengan suficiente tierra y ganen guerras

column2: Celtic paganism claims to be one of the last surviving branches of the ancient druidic belief systems. A pantheon of gods and a world full of spirits, the children of Dana rule the Skies, the Earth and the Otherworld. The main gods are Dana and Nuada, Angus, the god of Youth, Macha, the horse goddess, the great Daghda, Manannan mac Lir, the Sea God and Lugh of the Long Spear. Features:\n§Y*§! Rulers are limited to Tanist Succession
column3:
Le paganisme celte est l'une des dernières branches survivantes des anciens systèmes de croyances druidiques. Un panthéon de dieux et un monde rempli d'esprits, les enfants de Dana gouvernent le Ciel, la Terre et l'Aultre Monde. Les principaulx dieux sont Dana et Nuada, Angus, le dieu de la Jeunesse, Macha, la déesse du Cheval, le Grand Daghda, Manannasn Mac Lir, le Dieu de la Mer et Lugh de la Grande Lance. Caractéristiques en jeu la définition: 
§Y*§! Peult attaquer les voisins pour les piller 
§Y*§! Les non-païens sans technologie avancée ont une très faible limite d'approvisionnement dans les terres païennes 
§Y*§! Peult déclarer des guerres d'Assujettissement contre tous les aultres païens 
§Y*§! Seul le mode de succession de Partage Salique est disponible 
§Y*§! Les chefs païens ne peuvent point déclarer de Guerres Saintes 
§Y*§! Inférieur en conversion et vulnérables aulx missionnaires non-païens 
§Y*§! Les chefs païens perdent du Prestige s'ils sont en paix depuis trop longtemps 
§Y*§! La foi païenne celte peult estre réformée
column4:
Celtic Heidentum ist eine der letzten überlebenden Zweige der alten druidic Glaubenssysteme. Ein Pantheon der Götter und eine Welt voller Geister, regieren die Kinder Dana den Himmel, die Erde und der Anderswelt. Die wichtigsten Götter sind Dana und Nuada, Angus, der Gott der Jugend, Macha, das Pferd Göttin, der große Daghda, Manannan mac Lir, das Meer und Gott Lugh des Long Spear. Definieren von Eigenschaften im Spiel: 
§Y*§! Kann Nachbarn Beute überfallen 
§Y*§! Low-Tech-nicht-Heiden haben eine sehr niedrige Versorgung Grenze in Pagan Kreise 
§Y*§! Kann Unterwerfung Kriege gegen alle anderen Heiden erklären 
§Y*§! Lineale sind Tanist Succession begrenzt 
§Y*§! Lineale kann nicht erklären, Holy Wars 
§Y*§! Minderwertige bei Umwandlung und anfällig für nicht-heidnische Missionare 
§Y*§! Lineale verlieren Prestige, wenn in Frieden zu lange 
§Y*§! Die celtic Pagan Glauben reformiert werden
column6:
Celtic paganism is one of the last surviving branches of the ancient druidic belief systems. A pantheon of gods and a world full of spirits, the children of Dana rule the Skies, the Earth and the Otherworld. The main gods are Dana and Nuada, Angus, the god of Youth, Macha, the horse goddess, the great Daghda, Manannan mac Lir, the Sea God and Lugh of the Long Spear. Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! Can raid neighbors for loot
§Y*§! Low-tech non-pagans have very low Supply Limit in Pagan counties
§Y*§! Can declare Subjugation Wars against all other pagans
§Y*§! Rulers are limited to Tanist Succession
§Y*§! Rulers cannot declare Holy Wars
§Y*§! Inferior at conversion and vulnerable to non-pagan missionaries
§Y*§! Rulers lose Prestige if at peace for too long
§Y*§! The Celtic Pagan faith can be Reformed

column2: The reformed Celtic faith has a standardized liturgy etched on the many raised stones on the British Isles, telling the story of Don and her children. It is led by the circle of the Druids with the Arch-Druid as the religious leader of the faithful. Defining features in-game:\n§Y*§! The Arch-Druid can call Great Holy Wars
column3: La foi celte réformée a une liturgie standardisée gravée sur les nombreuses pierres levées dans les Isles Britanniques, narrant l'histoire de Don et de ses enfants. Elle est dirigée par le Cercle des Druides avec l'Archidruide comme dirigeant religieux des croyants. Caractéristiques dans le jeu :\n§Y*§! L'Archidruide peult lancer de Grandes Guerres Saintes
column4: The reformed Celtic faith has a standardized liturgy etched on the many raised stones on the British Isles, telling the story of Don and her children. column2: The Kemetic religion is polytheistic, with a large selection of gods and cults. It originated in ancient Egypt and with the conquests of the Egyptian empire, it would go on to become the dominant religion in the middle east until the rise of the Roman empire. Features: \n§Y*§! Can restore Luxor Temple \n§Y*§! Can construct pyramids
column3:
La religion kémite est polythéiste, avec un grand nombre de dieux et de cultes. Elle est née dans l'Ancienne Egypte et s'étendit avec les conquestes de l'Empire Egyptien, au point de devenir la religion dominante au Moyen-Orient jusqu'à l'avènement de l'Empire Romain. Caractéristiques en jeu : 
§Y*§! Les dirigeants peuvent lancer des Guerres Saintes
§Y*§! Peult répandre sa religion chez les Païens 
§Y*§! Peult restaurer le Temple de Luxor 
§Y*§! Peult construire des Pyramides
column4:
The Kemetic religion is polytheistic, with a large selection of gods and cults. It originated in ancient Egypt and with the conquests of the Egyptian empire, it would go on to become the dominant religion in the middle east until the rise of the Roman empire. Defining features in-game: 
§Y*§! Rulers can declare Holy Wars
§Y*§! Can proselytize pagan religions 
§Y*§! Can restore Luxor Temple 
§Y*§! Can construct pyramids
column6:

column2: Germanic paganism refers to the diverse pre-Christian beliefs of the continental Germanic peoples. Similar to Scandinavian paganism, with parallel gods and practices, it nonetheless had its own unique practices and beliefs. The chief god of the pantheon is Wodan, also known as Wuotan, Woden, or Wotan, parallel to the Norse Odin. Other important deities include Frijjo, goddess of love, related to the Norse deity Freya, and Donar, god of thunder, related to the Norse Thor
column3: Germanic paganism refers to the diverse pre-Christian beliefs of the continental Germanic peoples. Similar to Scandinavian paganism, with parallel gods and practices, it nonetheless had its own unique practices and beliefs. The chief god of the pantheon is Wodan, also known as Wuotan, Woden, or Wotan, parallel to the Norse Odin. Other important deities include Frijjo, goddess of love, related to the Norse deity Freya, and Donar, god of thunder, related to the Norse Thor

column2: Adoptionists reject the Holy Trinity, believing that Jesus Christ was adopted as God's son at his ascension, chosen because of his sinless devotion to the will of God. They do not revere the Holy Mary, and were declared a Christian heresy at the end of the 2nd Century.
column3: Adoptionists reject the Holy Trinity, believing that Jesus Christ was adopted as God's son at his ascension, chosen because of his sinless devotion to the will of God. They do not revere the Holy Mary, and were declared a Christian heresy at the end of the 2nd Century. In-game, they are considered a Catholic heresy. They have no religion head, and no special features seperating them from other Catholics.

column2: Sometimes referred to as 'Gregorian', this was one of the early Christian faiths founded in Armenia by the Apostles Bartholomew and Thaddeus. It split from orthodox Christianity in the 6th century as a matter of Christology -- they are miaphysite, believing Christ to be of one incarnate nature, where both divine and human nature are united.\n§Y*§! Apostolics only recognize the three Petrine Sees\n§Y*§! Apostolics may choose between the Alexandrite and Antiochian schools of theology

column2:
Considered the 'main' branch of Christianity after the Council of Chalcedon repudiated monophysitism in 451AD, it is split between the Latin West and the Greek East -- both of which have been increasingly growing apart from each other, developing their own rites, in the centuries since. Many believe the two are headed for a schism of their own, something that could split the entire Christian world in two should it come to pass.

§YNOTE§!: Events building towards the schism may be stopped if
§Y*§! A Patriarch Supreme has been anointed, or
§Y*§! Rome is not held by a Chalcedonian bishop following the Latin Rites, or
§Y*§! Constantinople is not held by a Chalcedonian bishop following the Greek Rites

column2:
The Druze religion originated in the Ismaili sect of Shi'a Islam, but has many features of gnosticism, neoplatonism in addition to the Abrahamic religions. Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! May use 'Study Esoteric Knowledge' ambition to ascend to Uqqal (Initiate) status
§Y*§! Pious Uqqal may ascend to Ajawid status
§Y*§! Pious or charismatic Druze may invade fellow Muslims with the same criteria as the Prepared Invasion CB
§Y*§! A pious Ajawid may become the Druze Shaykh religion head
§Y*§! If the Druze acquire a religion head, it will no longer be a heresy
§Y*§! Believe in reincarnation
§Y*§! May not go on Hajj

column2: The Hurufi faith is a mystical, kabbalistic, Sufi sect within Islam, regarded as a heresy. Defining features in-game:\n§Y*§! Hurufi characters can create great works of Islamic poetry\n§Y*§! Hurufi scholars may study the Qur'an to unlock its secrets and gain considerable benefits
column3:
The Hurufi faith is a mystical, kabbalistic, Sufi sect within Islam, regarded as a heresy. Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! Hurufi characters can create great works of Islamic poetry
§Y*§! Hurufi scholars may study the Qur'an to unlock its secrets and gain considerable benefits
§Y*§! Hurufi characters have a learning bonus but a stewardship malus
§Y*§! The Hurufi Sheikhdom is held by a secular ruler, and can cease to exist.
§Y*§! The Hurufi Sheikh can subjugate other Hurufi rulers freely
§Y*§! The Hurufi Sheikh can declare great Jihads
§Y*§! Hurufi rulers can - and are expected to have - multiple wives
§Y*§! Mosque Holdings can be held by anyone without penalty
§Y*§! Hurufi dynasties grow decadent unless the men have enough land and win wars

column2: Mandaeism is a gnostic religion with a strongly dualistic worldview. Its adherents revere Adam, Abel, Seth, Enosh, Noah, Shem, Aram and especially John the Baptist, but reject Abraham, Moses and Jesus of Nazareth. It is represented in-game as an early form of Manichaeism, and a potential heresy should it resurface.
column3: Mandaeism is a gnostic religion with a strongly dualistic worldview. Its adherents revere Adam, Abel, Seth, Enosh, Noah, Shem, Aram and especially John the Baptist, but reject Abraham, Moses and Jesus of Nazareth. It is represented in-game as an early form of Manichaeism, and a potential heresy should it resurface. It has no special mechanics and no religious leader.

column2:
Manichaeism is a Gnostic religion founded by the alleged prophet Mani who was put to death by the Sassanid Shahanshah Bahram I in 277. His 'Religion of Light' incorporated elements of Christianity, Zoroastrianism, Buddhism and Gnosticism. At one point, Manichaeism spread far and wide, and was the biggest competitor with Christianity for replacing classical Paganism until it began to fade in the 6th century. Features:
§Y*§! The Manichaean Archegos exists in the Old Gods and Charlemagne bookmarks, and may be restored later
§Y*§! Manichaeans have their own holy festival, the Bema Feast
§Y*§! Manichaeans may elect to dedicate themselves to a Shekhinah upon adulthood
§Y*§! A new holy order that may be founded, called the Army of Light

column2:
Mazdak was a Zoroastrian priest who claimed to be a prophet of Ahura Mazda. He attempted to reform the religion with Gnostic elements, and advocated communal possessions and welfare programs. His teachings fell out of favor with the Shahanshah Kavadh I in 524, but pockets of the heresy survived in remote areas. Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! Mazdakis may dedicate themselves to a Power upon adulthood
§Y*§! Mazdakis are expected to share the wealth of the state with the people
§Y*§! A religion head can be created with a decision

column2:
The Messalians, or Euchites ('Those who Pray'), are a heretical Christian sect that originated in Mesopotamia, influenced by dualistic faiths like Zoroastrianism. Messalians believe that God can be perceived by the carnal senses, and that this perception is necessary to reach perfection. Each person is born with an inner demon, and only intense prayer can drive it out. They also believe that Lucifer is the elder son of God and a force for good, and that incest is sacred since it was practised by the children of Adam and Eve. They have no formal rites and no strict church hierarchy. Features:
§Y*§! Messalians must pray to expel their personal demons
§Y*§! Once the demons are driven out, they can achieve the status of Perfection
§Y*§! Messalians may choose a patron saint to worship
§Y*§! Messalians can create their own Holy Order, the Army of Lucifer
§Y*§! The Patriarch of Antioch will automatically become the new religion head
§Y*§! Messalians only recognize the Petrine Sees

column2:
Copts are miaphysite, stressing that Christ had but a single nature, but of both human and divine character. This stance split them off from the main branch of Christianity after the council of Chalcedon in 451. Though not viewed as outright heretics by Orthodox and Catholic Christians, it is a fine distinction. The nominal head of the Coptic Church is the Pope of Alexandria.
§Y*§! Copts only recognize the three Petrine Sees
§Y*§! Copts may opt to become Desert Fathers and Desert Mothers instead of monks and nuns
§Y*§! Copts may choose between the Alexandrite and Antiochian schools of theology

column2:
Monophysitism is an early Christian heresy which states that Christ had but a single nature. This is the opposite of the Nestorian position where Christ has two separate natures - one divine and one human. The nominal head of the Monophysite Church is the Monophysite Pope of Alexandria.
§Y*§! Monophysites only recognize the three Petrine Sees
§Y*§! Monophysites may opt to become Desert Fathers and Desert Mothers instead of monks and nuns
§Y*§! Monophysites may choose between the Alexandrite and Antiochian schools of theology

column2: Nestorianism is an early Christian branch which states that Christ has two separate natures - one divine and one human. This is the opposite of the Monophysite position where Christ has but a single nature. The nominal head of the Nestorian Church is the Patriarch of the East.\n§Y*§! Nestorians only recognize the three Petrine Sees\n§Y*§! Nestorians may choose between the Alexandrite and Antiochian schools of theology

column2: Prometheanism is the worship of the Titan Prometheus and, to a lesser extent, his brother Epimetheus, as the fathers of humanity. Prometheanism acknowledges the existence, and divinity, of the Hellenic gods, but rejects their worthiness as beings to be worshiped. Prometheans value intellectual pursuits above all, finding guile, diplomacy, and a quick wit to be the highest art forms. They find violence distasteful, but recognize that it is ocassionally necessary.

The Qarmatians are a splinter sect of Ismaili Islam, rooted in the Persian Gulf that mixes Islamic teachings with traditional Persian mysticism. They believed that there were seven ages of man, each with a new religion and prophet, and the final age was approaching.
column3:
The Qarmatians are a splinter sect of Ismaili Islam, rooted in the Persian Gulf that mixes Islamic teachings with traditional Persian mysticism. They believed that there were seven ages of man, each with a new religion and prophet, and the final age was approaching. Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! Qarmatians can form their own caliphate
§Y*§! The Qarmatian Caliph can declare great Jihads
§Y*§! Qarmatian rulers can - and are expected to have - multiple wives
§Y*§! Mosque Holdings can be held by anyone without penalty
§Y*§! Qarmatian dynasties grow decadent unless the men have enough land and win wars

column2: Quranists hold the Qur'an to be the only authentic source of Islamic faith and reject the validity of the hadith and sharia law, considering them falsehoods.
column3:
Quranists hold the Qur'an to be the only authentic source of Islamic faith and reject the validity of the hadith and sharia law, considering them falsehoods. In-game they are a heresy of the Sunni religion. Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! Quranists can form their own caliphate
§Y*§! The Quranist Caliph can declare great Jihads
§Y*§! Unlike other Muslims, Quranists may not have multiple wives
§Y*§! Mosque Holdings can be held by anyone without penalty
§Y*§! Quranist dynasties grow decadent unless the men have enough land and win wars

column2: The Cult of Titan rejects the authority of the Hellenic Gods, considering them usurpers and unworthy of their worship. Titan Cultists reject the kind of civilization Hellenism has typically fostered, and have much more in common with the more 'barbaric' religions.
column3: The Cult of Titan rejects the authority of the Hellenic Gods, considering them usurpers and unworthy of their worship. Titan Cultists reject the kind of civilization Hellenism has typically fostered, and have much more in common with the more 'barbaric' religions.

column2: Tondrakians are an anti-feudal, anti-church sect that originally flourished in Armenia between the 9th and 11th Century. They denied the immortality of the soul, the afterlife, and the rights of the church to rule over its fellow man. They supported property rights for peasants and equality between men and women.
column3:
Tondrakians are an anti-feudal, anti-church sect that originally flourished in Armenia between the 9th and 11th Century. They denied the immortality of the soul, the afterlife, and the rights of the church to rule over its fellow man. They supported property rights for peasants and equality between men and women. In-game they are treated as a Miaphysite heresy. Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! There is no religious head
§Y*§! Tondrakians may install women as priests
§Y*§! Female rulers suffer no opinion penalty

column2: The Hellenistic religion is polytheistic, with a pantheon of twelve major gods including Jupiter, Mars, Mercury, Venus, Minerva and Vesta. It originated in ancient Greece and with the conquests of Alexander the Great and the Roman Empire, it would go on to become the dominant religion in the Mediterranean world until the rise of Christendom.
column3:
La religion Hellénique est polythéiste, avec un panthéon de douze dieux majeurs incluant Jupiter, Mars, Mercure, Vénus, Minerve et Vesta. Elle est née en Grèce Antique et devint la religion dominante du monde méditerrannéen avec les conquestes d'Alexandre le Grand et de l'Empire Romain, jusqu'à la naissance du christianisme. Caractéristiques en jeu : 
§Y*§! Les dirigeants peuvent lancer des Guerres Saintes
§Y*§! Peult propager sa religion chez les Païens 
§Y*§! Peult reformer le Pontifex Maximus
column4:
The Hellenistic religion is polytheistic, with a pantheon of twelve major gods including Jupiter, Mars, Mercury, Venus, Minerva and Vesta. It originated in ancient Greece and with the conquests of Alexander the Great and the Roman Empire, it would go on to become the dominant religion in the Mediterranean world until the rise of Christendom. Defining features in-game: 
§Y*§! Rulers can declare Holy Wars
§Y*§! Can proselytize pagan religions 
§Y*§! Can reform the Pontifex Maximus

column2: Sahelian religion is a blanket term for the diverse pagan beliefs of the tribes of Sub-Saharan West Africa. Ancestor worship, animism and totemistic shamanism dominate, but there also various pantheons of gods.
column3:
La religion sahélienne est un terme qui recouvre les diverses croyances païennes des tribus de l'Afrique Occidentale sub-saharienne. Le culte des ancestres, l'animisme et le chamanisme totémique y dominent, mais on y trouve aussi divers panthéons. Dans le jeu :
§Y*§! Peuvent piller les voisins pour obtenir un butin
§Y*§! Les non-païens qui ont peu de moyens techniques ont une très basse limite d'approvisionnement dans les comtés païens
§Y*§! Peuvent déclarer des guerres d'assujettissement contre tous les aultres païens 
§Y*§! Les dirigeants n'ont accès qu'au mode de succession du Partage Salique
§Y*§! Les dirigeants ne peuvent point déclarer de guerres saintes
§Y*§! Inférieurs en conversion et vulnérables aulx missionnaires non-païens
§Y*§! Bonus défensifs pour les comtés sahéliens païens
§Y*§! La foi païenne sahélienne peult estre réformée
column4:
Westafrikanische Religion ist ein Oberbegriff für die vielfältigen, heidnischen Glaubensvorstellungen der westafrikanischen Völker südlich der Sahara. Vorfahrenverehrung, Animismus und Schamanismus sind vorherrschend, aber es gibt auch mehrere Götterpantheone. Bestimmende Merkmale im Spiel: 
§Y*§!Kann Nachbarn überfallen und plündern
§Y*§! Nicht-Heiden haben eine sehr geringere Maximal-Versorgung in heidnischen Regionen
§Y*§!Kann Unterwerfungskriege gegen alle anderen Heiden ausrufen
§Y*§!Herrscher sind beschränkt auf Gavelkind-Erbfolge
§Y*§!Herrscher können keine Heiligen Kriege ausrufen
§Y*§!Unterlegene Konvertierung und anfällig für nicht-heidnische Missionare
§Y*§!Verteidigungsboni in heidnischen westafrikanischen Regionen
§Y*§!Das westafrikanische Heidentum kann reformiert werden
column6:
La Religión Africana Occidental es un término general para las diversas creencias paganas de las tribus de África Subsahariana Occidental. El culto a los antepasados??, el animismo y el chamanismo totémico dominan, pero también diversos panteones de dioses. Definiendo características del juego:
§Y*§! Puede atacar a los vecinos por el botín
§Y*§! Los no-paganos con baja tecnología tienen un Límite de Suministro muy bajo en los países Paganos
§Y*§! Pueden declarar Guerras de Subyugación contra todos los otros paganos 
§Y*§! Los gobernantes están limitados a la Sucesión Gavelkind
§Y*§! Los gobernantes no pueden declarar Guerras Santas
§Y*§! Inferior en conversión y vulnerable a los misioneros no-paganos
§Y*§! Bonificaciones defensivas en países Paganos del África Occidental
§Y*§! La fe Africana Occidental Pagana se puede Reformar

column2: The reformed Sahelian religion is a fusion of many popular beliefs, with a single Holy Book including a creation myth, chapters on the spirits, totem animal fables and gods. The church also has a standardized liturgy and a formal church hierarchy led by a High Priest (or Priestess), who can be vassalized by secular rulers.
column3:
La religion sahélienne réformée est une fusion de plusieurs croyances, dotée d'un livre saint unique qui comprend un mythe sur la création, des chapitres sur les esprits, des fables sur les animaulx totems et les dieulx. L'église possède aussi une liturgie standardisée et une hiérarchie ecclésiastique symbolique avec à sa teste un grand prestre (ou une grande prestresse), qui peut estre vassalisé(e) par des dirigeants laïcs. Dans le jeu :
§Y*§! Il y a toujours un Grand Prestre, mesme s'il ne possède point de terre
§Y*§! Peuvent piller les voisins pour un butin
§Y*§! Le Grand Prestre peult déclarer de Grandes Guerres Saintes
column4:
Der reformierte westafrikanische Glaube ist der Zusammenschluss vieler volkstümlicher Glaubensvorstellungen, mit einem einzigen Heiligen Buch, das einen Schöpfungsmythos, Kapiteln über die Geister, Totemtiere und Götter beinhaltet. Die Kirche besitzt außerdem standardisierte Liturgien und eine formelle Kirchenhierarchie, angeführt von einem Hohepriester (oder Hohepriesterin), der Vasall weltlicher Herrscher sein kann. Bestimmende Merkmale im Spiel:
§Y*§!Es gibt immer einen Hohepriester, selbst wenn er kein Land besitzt
§Y*§!Kann Nachbarn überfallen und plündern
§Y*§!Der Hohepriester kann Große Heilige Kriege ausrufen
column6:
La reformada religión Africana Occidental es una fusión de muchas creencias populares, con un único Libro Sagrado con un mito de la creación, capítulos sobre los espíritus, fábulas de animales totémicos y dioses. La iglesia también tiene una liturgia estandarizada y una jerarquía formal dirigida por un Sumo Sacerdote (o Sacerdotisa), que puede ser vasallizado por gobernantes seculares. Definiendo características del juego:
§Y*§! Siempre hay un Sumo Sacerdote, aunque no tenga tierras
§Y*§! Puede atacar a los vecinos por el botín
§Y*§! El Sumo Sacerdote puede convocar Grandes Guerras Santas

column2:
Yazidism is an ancient faith that incorporates elements of both Zoroastrianism as well as Muslim and Gnostic religions in syncretic fashion. Yazidis believe that God created the world and left seven angels in charge, the chief of whom is the Peacock Angel, Malek Taus or Shaytan, a being usually compared by Christians and Muslims to Satan--a fact which has made Yazidis be declared 'devil-worshipers'. Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! Yazidis go on a pilgrimage to Lalish, north of Mosul
§Y*§! Instead of a great feast, Yazidis celebrate the Circulation of the Peacock festival
§Y*§! Believe in reincarnation
§Y*§! Young Yazidi men may be declared koasasa, or the reincarnation of one of the Seven Archangels
§Y*§! A powerful enough ruler may declare the faith to be no longer a heresy

column2: Zurvanism is a branch of Zoroastrianism that believes in the existence of Zurvan, a genderless god of of infinite time (and space), for whom there is no distinction between good and evil. Zurvan is the parent of the two opposites representing the good god, Ahura Mazda, and the evil Angra Mainyu, unlike normal Zoroastrianism, where Ahura Mazda is the Supreme Being. Zurvanism is further divided by its three schools of thought: Aesthetic, Fatalistic and Materialistic.
column3: Zurvanism is a branch of Zoroastrianism that believes in the existence of Zurvan, a genderless god of of infinite time (and space), for whom there is no distinction between good and evil. Zurvan is the parent of the two opposites representing the good god, Ahura Mazda, and the evil Angra Mainyu, unlike normal Zoroastrianism, where Ahura Mazda is the Supreme Being. Zurvanism is further divided by its three schools of thought: Aesthetic, Fatalistic and Materialistic.

column2:
The reformed Norse Pagan faith has a Holy Book written in runes with chapters on Creation, the gods, Ragnarok, and secret spells - 'galdrs'. The church has a standardized liturgy and a formal church hierarchy led by the Fylkir, who - much like an Islamic Caliph - is both a secular ruler and the religious leader of the faithful. Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! Fleets can navigate major rivers
§Y*§! Rulers can Prepare Invasions
§Y*§! The Fylkir can call Great Holy Wars
column3:
La foi du paganisme nordique réformée a un livre sacré écrit en runes, incluant des chapitres sur la Création, les dieux, le Ragnarök, et les incantations secrètes ('galdrs'). L'église possède une liturgie standardisée et une hiérarchie symbolique dirigée par le 'Fylkir' qui, un peu comme le calife islamique, est à la fois dirigeant laïc et chef spirituel. Dans le jeu :
§Y*§! Peut effectuer des raids côtiers partout
§Y*§! Les flottes peuvent naviguer sur les principaux fleuves
§Y*§! Les dirigeants peuvent préparer des invasions
§Y*§! Le Fylkir peut déclarer de grandes guerres saintes
column4:
Das reformierte nordische Heidentum besitzt ein Heiliges Buch, geschrieben in Runen, mit Kapiteln über die Schöpfung, die Götter, Ragnarok und geheime Zaubersprüche - 'galdrs'. Die Kirche besitzt standardisierte Liturgien und eine formelle Kirchenhierarchie, angeführt vom 'Fylkir', der - ähnlich dem islamischen Kaliphen - sowohl ein sekulärer Herrscher als auch ein religiöser Anführer ist. Bestimmende Merkmale im Spiel: 
§Y*§! Kann überall Küstenraubzüge durchführen
§Y*§!Flotten können Hauptflüsse befahren
§Y*§! Herrscher können Invasionen vorbereiten
§Y*§! Der Fylkyr kann Große Heilige Kriege einberufen
column6:
La reformada fe Pagana Nórdica tiene un Libro Sagrado escrito en runas con capítulos dedicados a la Creación, los dioses, Ragnarok, y los hechizos secretos, galdrs. La iglesia tiene una liturgia estandarizada y una jerarquía formal dirigida por el Fylkir, que, al igual que un Califa Islámico, es a la vez un gobernante secular y el líder religioso de los fieles. Definiendo características del juego:
§Y*§! Pueden realizar incursiones costeras en cualquier sitio
§Y*§! Las flotas pueden navegar los principales ríos
§Y*§! Los gobernantes pueden Preparar Invasiones
§Y*§! El Fylkir puede llamar a la Gran Guerra Santa
